maqras.text: Nanigoto ni tsuite, kare-ra wa tazune au no ka
Idaina shosoku ni tsui te
Sore ni tsuite, kare-ra wa iken ga kotonaru
Iya, kare-ra wa yagate shirou
Iya, iya, kare-ra wa yagate shirudearou
Ware wa daichi o, hirobiro to shinakatta ka
Mata yamayama o, kui to shitate wanai ka
Ware wa anata gata o ryosei ni tsukuri
mata kyusoku no tame, anata gata no suimin o sadame
yoru o oi to shi
hiru o seikei no shudan to shite sadameta
Mata ware wa, anata gata no ue ni kengo ni 7-so (no ten) o uchi-date
teru ya kashi tomoshi hi o (sono naka ni) oki
ware wa kumo kara yutaka ni ame o furase
sore ni yotte, kara-mono ya yasai o moe dasa se
samazamana en o shigera seru
Hontoni sabaki no hi wa sadame rarete ite
sonohi, rappa ga fuka reruto anata gata wa gun o nashite detekuru
Ten wa aka rete kazukazu no mon to nari
yamayama wa utsusa rete shinkiro no yo ni naru
Hontoni jigoku wa, machibuse no badeari
haishin-sha no ochitsuku tokoro
kare-ra wa itsumademo sono naka ni sumudearou
Sokode suzushi-sa mo ajiwaezu,(don'na) nomimono mo nai
nietagiru yu to no no soto ni wa
(Kare-ra no tame) fusawashi hoshodearu
Hontoni kare-ra wa,(sono okonai ni taisuru) seisan o kibo shinaide ita
Mata kare-ra wa waga shirushi o usodearu to itte, tsuyoku kyohi shita
Ware wa issai no koto o, ten no sho ni tomete iru
Dakara anata gata wa (jibun no okonai no kekka o) ajiwae. Ware wa chobatsu o zoka suru bakaridearu
Hontoni omo o osoreru mono ni wa, anzen'na basho (rakuen) ga aru
Midori no en ya, budo-en
mune no fukureta onaji toshigoro no otome-tachi
mata naminamito afureru hai
Sokode wa tsumaranu hanashi ya itsuwarigoto o kikanai
Korera wa anata no nushi kara no hosho, tamamono no kessandearu
Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono no shu, jihibukaki okata (kara no tamamonodeari), dare mo kare ni katarikakeru koto wa dekinai
Seirei to tenshi-tachi ga, seiretsu shite tatsu hi, jihibukaki okata kara o yurushi o ete tadashi koto o iu mono igai ni wa, dare mo kuchi o kiku koto ga dekinai
Sore wa shinjitsu no hidearu. Dakara dare demo nozomu mono wa,-nushi no omoto ni modoruga i

Hontoni ware wa, chobatsu ga chikai to, anata gata ni keikoku shita. Sonohi, hito wa, jibun no ryoho no te ga maemotte itta mono (shogyo) o mirudearou. Fushin-sha wa,`a , nasakenai, watashi ga chirideattanaraba.' To iudearou
Araarashiku (tsumibukaimono no tamashi o) hikihanasu mono ni oite (chikau)
yasashiku (shinkobukai-sha no tamashi o) hikidasu mono ni oite
oyogu yo ni (jihi no tsukai ni) kasso suru mono ni oite
sakiwoarasotte zenshin suru mono ni oite
(nushi no meirei de) koto o shori suru mono ni oite (chikau)
Sonohi (dai ichi no rappa de), shindo ga (subete no mono o) yurugashi
ji no rappa (de shindo) ga, tsudzuku
(Fushin-sha no) kokoro wa, sonohi ononoki furue
me o fuserudearou
Kare-ra wa iu. `Watashi-tachi wa hajime (seizen) no jotai ni, hontoni kaeru nodeshou ka
Nani to, watashi-tachi wa kuchihateta hone ni natte shimatta no ni
Kare-ra wa iu. `So no baai (fukkatsu), son'na modoridesu
(Fukkatsu wa), tada hitokoe no sakebidearu
Miyo, kare-ra wa mezamete (chijo ni) arawareru
Musa no monogatari ga, anata ni todoita ka
Omo ga towa no hijiridani ni, kare o yoba reta toki o omoiokose
(Kare wa ose rareta. ) `Anata wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontoni kare wa me ni amaru monodearu
Soshite kare ni itte yaru ga i. “Anata wa (tsumi kara) kiyome raretai no ka
Watashi wa anata o,-nushi no omoto ni michibiku. Anata wa (kare o) osore nasai.”
(Musa wa) saidai no shirushi o kare ni shimeshita
Daga kare (firuaun) wa sore o usodearu to shi,(michibiki ni) shitagawanakatta
Se o mukete isoide satta
Kare (firuaun) wa,(sono min o) atsume sengen shite
itta. `Watashi wa anata gata no shu, shiko-shadearu
Sokode arra wa kare o 懲 Shime, raise to gense no seikatsu ni chobatsu o kuwae rareta
Hontoni kono nakaniha (omo o) osoreru mono e no hitotsu no kyokun ga aru
Anata gata wa (kare ga) uchi tate rareta ten (no sozo) ga, anata gata o tsukuru koto yori muzukashi to demo omou no ka
Kare wa sore o takaku kakage, sorekara totonoe
yoru o kuraku nasa re, mata, komyo o gen wa sa reru
Sonogo, daichi o nobe hiroge rareta
Soko kara mizu to bokujo o araware sase
mata yamayama o sore ni shikkari to sue rare
anata gata to anata gata no kachiku no tame no, yoeki ni kyo sa reru
Sore de oki saiyaku ga kuru to
sonohi, hitobito wa (gense de) sono doryoku shita koto o omoidashi
mata goku hi wa, dare demo miru (hodo no)-sha ni (ariari to) gen wa sa reru
Sonotoki, hidoku me ni amatta mono
mata konoyo no seikatsu o omonjite ita mono wa
hontoni hi goku ga sono sumaidearou
Daga omo no gozen ni tatsu koto o osoreta mono, mata teiretsuna yokubo ni taishi (jibun no) tamashi o yokusei shita mono wa
hontoni rakuen ga sono sumaidearou
Kare-ra wa sonotoki ni tsuite, anata ni tou. `Sore ga torai suru no wa, nanji (no hi)desu ka
Anata wa, nani ni yotte sore o tsuge rareyou ka
Sono shumatsu (no chishiki) wa, anata no omo ni aru dake
Anata wa, sore o osoreru mono e no, hitori no keikoku-sha ni suginai
Kare-ra ga sore o miru hi,(haka no naka ni) tairyu shite ita no wa, ichi yu ka ichi asa ni suginakatta yo ni omoudearou
